biotools.summary:
Predicting Effect of Mutations on Protein-Protein Interactions.

#SAMMBE 3D can be used to i) calculate the binding free energy caused by single mutation and ii) predict whether a particular mutation is disruptive or non-disruptive.

User need to download the script and two models. Regression.model is the model for predicting binding free energy due to mutation and classification.model is the model #to identify disruptive/non-disruptive mutation.

bioschemas.name: SAAMBE-3D
